title: Conduct a fleet readiness inspection
description: Travel to Hoth to inspect the fleet's preparedness for upcoming operations.

title: Review construction protocols
description: Visit Endor to review the latest construction protocols with local engineers.

title: Host a diplomatic summit
description: Arrive on Naboo to host a summit with planetary officials.

title: Evaluate security measures
description: Go to Lothal to evaluate the effectiveness of current security measures.

title: Oversee intelligence briefing
description: Travel to Tatooine to oversee an intelligence briefing with local commanders.

title: Audit mining operations
description: Visit Kessel to audit the efficiency of mining operations.

title: Supervise prisoner transfer
description: Go to Mustafar to supervise the transfer of high-profile prisoners.

title: Inspect shipyard facilities
description: Travel to Corellia to inspect the maintenance of shipyard facilities.

title: Attend a tactical planning session
description: Arrive on Coruscant to attend a high-level tactical planning session.

title: Investigate data breach
description: Go to Scarif to investigate a recent data breach in the archives.

title: Assess blockade effectiveness
description: Travel to Mon Cala to assess the effectiveness of the current blockade.

title: Recruit new operatives
description: Visit Nar Shaddaa to recruit new operatives for special missions.

title: Evaluate outpost logistics
description: Go to Dantooine to evaluate logistics at the remote outpost.

title: Observe training exercises
description: Travel to Kamino to observe advanced training exercises.

title: Mediate local disputes
description: Arrive on Jedha to mediate disputes among local factions.

title: Facilitate leadership transition
description: Go to Bespin to facilitate a smooth transition of local leadership.

title: Monitor production quotas
description: Visit Geonosis to monitor the fulfillment of production quotas.

title: Lead a reconnaissance mission
description: Travel to Dagobah to lead a reconnaissance mission in uncharted territory.

title: Survey archaeological sites
description: Go to Moraband to survey newly discovered archaeological sites.

title: Review law enforcement practices
description: Visit Mandalore to review local law enforcement practices.

title: Represent command at ceremony
description: Travel to Alderaan to represent command at a formal ceremony.

title: Oversee weapons demonstration
description: Go to Eadu to oversee a demonstration of new weapons technology.

title: Coordinate relief efforts
description: Arrive on Ryloth to coordinate relief efforts after a natural disaster.

title: Inspect communications array
description: Travel to Sullust to inspect the planetary communications array.

title: Investigate trade irregularities
description: Go to Ord Mantell to investigate irregularities in trade shipments.

title: Review starfighter upgrades
description: Visit Fondor to review the latest upgrades to starfighter models.

title: Conduct leadership workshop
description: Travel to Yavin IV to conduct a workshop for emerging leaders.

title: Negotiate trade agreements
description: Go to Nal Hutta to negotiate new trade agreements.

title: Research force phenomena
description: Visit Lothal to research unexplained force phenomena.

title: Supervise droid deployment
description: Travel to Mygeeto to supervise the deployment of new droid units.

title: Assess planetary loyalty
description: Go to Shili to assess the loyalty of local government officials.

title: Participate in cultural exchange
description: Visit Exegol to participate in a cultural exchange program.

title: Inspect detention facilities
description: Travel to Wobani to inspect the condition of detention facilities.

title: Suppress piracy operations
description: Go to Florrum to suppress ongoing piracy operations.

title: Scout for resource deposits
description: Visit Atollon to scout for new resource deposits.

title: Secure fuel contracts
description: Travel to Abafar to secure long-term fuel contracts.

title: Meet with local dignitaries
description: Go to Serenno to meet with local dignitaries and discuss policy.

title: Review medical research
description: Visit Polis Massa to review the latest medical research findings.

title: Oversee environmental restoration
description: Travel to Lah'mu to oversee environmental restoration projects.

title: Apprehend a fugitive
description: Go to Socorro to apprehend a fugitive wanted for questioning.

title: Catalog ancient artifacts
description: Visit Ilum to catalog recently unearthed ancient artifacts.

title: Lead a training seminar
description: Travel to Crait to lead a seminar for new recruits.

title: Inspect shipyard expansion
description: Go to Anaxes to inspect the progress of shipyard expansion.

title: Mediate peace talks
description: Visit Chandrila to mediate ongoing peace talks.

title: Evaluate mining efficiency
description: Travel to Subterrel to evaluate the efficiency of mining operations.

title: Track a suspected spy
description: Go to Bothawui to track the movements of a suspected spy.

title: Supervise droid maintenance
description: Visit Mechis III to supervise the maintenance of droid units.

title: Study force anomalies
description: Travel to Mortis to study unique force anomalies.

title: Coordinate counter-insurgency
description: Go to Onderon to coordinate counter-insurgency operations.
